name: Flopp
description:
Flopp - navigate a block through a series of strange obstacles. The floor will fall, blocks will vanish, switches will activate, and a phantom will spawn out of nowhere and chase you to your death. Enjoy!

Use WASD, Arrow Keys, or the on-screen arrows to move the block around. Click and drag to rotate the display. Touch screen compatible.

Music is 'Wait' by C418.
